translation.zh: 所以你要不要做？

translation.en: Or am I giving it to one of the other guys?
translation.zh: 还是要我把这客户交给其他人？

translation.en: Fuck me.
translation.zh: 豁出去了

translation.en: [Ernie] Attaboy!
translation.zh: 好孩子！

translation.en: You're gonna do great.
translation.zh: -你一定会表现得很好 -闭嘴吧你

translation.en: -Shut up. -[Ernie] Let me know how it goes.
translation.zh: -你一定会表现得很好 -闭嘴吧你 完事儿了记得跟我汇报一下

translation.en: Fill 'er up?
translation.zh: 要加油吗？

translation.en: I wanna go to Dreamland.
translation.zh: 我想去梦乡

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: You'll do nicely.
translation.zh: 你一定没问题的

translation.en: ♪ You know you've gotta get goin' If you're gonna make a showin'... ♪
translation.zh: （比弗利山庄酒店）

translation.en: Welcome.
translation.zh: 欢迎二位

translation.en: Where are we going?
translation.zh: 我们这是去哪？

translation.en: I got us a room. My daughter's at home.
translation.zh: 我开了个房间 我女儿在家

translation.en: You aren't nervous about being recognized?
translation.zh: 你就不怕被认出来吗？

translation.en: That's the fun of it.
translation.zh: 这才是乐趣所在

translation.en: So, how long have you been here?
translation.zh: 你来这里多久了？

translation.en: Oh, you-- you mean in Los Angeles?
translation.zh: 噢 你… 你是说来洛杉矶吗？

translation.en: Just a couple of months. I'm from Missouri originally.
translation.zh: 几个月前来的 我老家在密苏里州

translation.en: Let me guess...
translation.zh: 让我猜猜…

translation.en: you came here to be a movie star.
translation.zh: 你来这里是为了当电影明星

translation.en: How did you know?
translation.zh: 你怎么知道？

translation.en: Takes one to know one.
translation.zh: 因为我跟你一样

translation.en: I was in pictures. Silent films.
translation.zh: 我之前是拍电影的 默声电影

translation.en: Good ones, too.
translation.zh: 我有一些很不错的作品

translation.en: But then came the talkies.
translation.zh: 但后来出现了有声电影

translation.en: I had one screen test,
translation.zh: 我参加过一次试镜

translation.en: and they told me there wasn't a place in talkies for ethnics.
translation.zh: 他们跟我说有声电影里 没有少数民族演员的位置

translation.en: A little "Jewey" was the word they used.
translation.zh: 确切来说 他们说的是“犹太妞”

translation.en: I politely informed them that Jews built this town and was shown the door.
translation.zh: 我礼貌地提醒他们 是犹太人建了这座城 但被他们请了出去

translation.en: Nobody thought a Jewish girl could be a movie star.
translation.zh: 没人觉得犹太女孩能当电影明星

translation.en: Nobody thought they were pretty.
translation.zh: 没人觉得她们漂亮

translation.en: So, I went to a bar and got drunk,
translation.zh: 然后我去了酒吧 喝了个烂醉

translation.en: met a low-level executive who said he was about to get a promotion.
translation.zh: 认识了一个自称马上就要被提拔的 低级别行政人员

translation.en: He said the only thing I could hope for was to be a development girl.
translation.zh: 他说我还是期待能找个 在剧组干杂活的工作比较实际

translation.en: A goddamn script reader.
translation.zh: 当个破剧本读评人

translation.en: I said, "Fuck this town, I'm done."
translation.zh: 我跟他说：“去死吧这座城 我受够了”

translation.en: He knocked me up, we got married, and I've been punishing him ever since.
translation.zh: 然后他搞大了我的肚子 我们结了婚 之后我就一直在惩罚他

translation.en: Oh, he did get that promotion, though.
translation.zh: 但他确实被提拔了

translation.en: Now he's the star, not this Jew.
translation.zh: 现在他成大人物了 看不上我这个犹太妞了

translation.en: Can I ask you a question, Jack?
translation.zh: 我可以问你一个问题吗 杰克？

translation.en: Why do you want to be a movie star?
translation.zh: 你为什么想当电影明星？

translation.en: You want an honest answer?
translation.zh: 你想听实话吗？

translation.en: Well, we're about to get naked and fuck each other, so why not?
translation.zh: 我们就要赤裸相见 享鱼水之欢了 我当然要听实话

translation.en: Well, um, if I'm being honest...
translation.zh: 其实 说真的…

translation.en: all my life, folks thought I was dumb.
translation.zh: 从小到大 人们都觉得我有点傻

translation.en: My mom and dad, my school teachers-- Oh, thank you.
translation.zh: 我爸妈 还有老师… 噢 谢谢

translation.en: All telling me I was lucky I was good-looking.
translation.zh: 他们都跟我说 我很幸运长了一副好皮囊

translation.en: And I knew what they meant,
translation.zh: 我懂他们的意思

translation.en: that that was all I had going for me.
translation.zh: 人们清一色地这么评价我

translation.en: I just want to do something big, you know?
translation.zh: 我就想做出一番大事业 你懂吗？

translation.en: Prove to them that I can be somebody in this world.
translation.zh: 向他们证明我也能成功

translation.en: Do something that matters.
translation.zh: 我也能做惊天动地的大事

translation.en: [chuckling] So movies...
translation.zh: 所以电影…

translation.en: you think they matter?
translation.zh: 你觉得拍电影是大事？

translation.en: You kidding?
translation.zh: 你在开玩笑吗？

translation.en: I know they do.
translation.zh: 我知道这是大事

translation.en: When you're walking through your life,
translation.zh: 我们每天的生活

translation.en: it's easy to feel like you're going through the motions, right?
translation.zh: 感觉就像在走过场一样 对吧？

translation.en: Like it doesn't really mean anything.
translation.zh: 并没有什么特殊意义

translation.en: But when I was a kid...
translation.zh: 但我的童年时期…

translation.en: I grew up on a farm in Missouri,
translation.zh: 我在密苏里一个农场长大

translation.en: so we had to drive a half hour to get to the picture show.
translation.zh: 所以我们去电影院的话 得开车半个小时

translation.en: And when I looked up at that enormous screen,
translation.zh: 有次我仰望大银幕

translation.en: I suddenly knew what life was supposed to feel like,
translation.zh: 我突然意识到人生应该是什么感觉

translation.en: what being alive was supposed to mean.
translation.zh: 活着该有的意义

translation.en: It was like there was something somewhere out there...
translation.zh: 就好像在某处 有什么东西…

translation.en: waiting for me.
translation.zh: 一直在等我

translation.en: That's what being alive is supposed to mean.
translation.zh: 那才是活着该有的意义

translation.en: I held my first hand at a movie theater,
translation.zh: 我在电影院第一次牵了女孩的手

translation.en: I-- I had my first kiss at a movie theater, I...
translation.zh: 第一次亲吻女孩 我…

translation.en: I don't know.
translation.zh: 我说不好

translation.en: What I do know is this:
translation.zh: 但我可以肯定的是

translation.en: every time I leave the picture show, I feel better than I did walking in.
translation.zh: 我每次离开电影院时 心情要比进去的时候好得多

translation.en: I never thought about it like that.
translation.zh: 我从未这么想过

translation.en: Can I ask you a question?
translation.zh: 我能问你一个问题吗？

translation.en: Only if you come and sit by me.
translation.zh: 除非你过来坐我身边

translation.en: I'm paying for company.
translation.zh: 我花钱是为了找人陪我

translation.en: Why are you here?
translation.zh: 你为什么来这里？

translation.en: I mean, doing this with me. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 我是说 跟我做这种事

translation.en: You got a husband you don't like?
translation.zh: 不喜欢你丈夫？

translation.en: Truth is, I don't entirely know how I'd get out of it.
translation.zh: 说实话 我根本不知道自己 如何能摆脱现在的生活

translation.en: I've gotten used to being rich, being taken care of.
translation.zh: 我已经当惯了有钱人 习惯了被人照顾

translation.en: But I know that he can barely bring himself to touch me anymore.
translation.zh: 但我知道他现在都懒得碰我

translation.en: So what's a girl to do?
translation.zh: 所以我能做什么呢？

translation.en: Bridge?
translation.zh: 打桥牌？

translation.en: Parcheesi?
translation.zh: 玩飞行棋？

translation.en: I tried sleeping with the help, but that's no good.
translation.zh: 我试过吃安眠药 但效果不大

translation.en: This is much easier.
translation.zh: 现在这样简单多了

translation.en: Less complicated.
translation.zh: 没那么复杂

translation.en: You know, coming to a public place like this, it's, uh...
translation.zh: 其实 来这样显眼的地方 那感觉就像…

translation.en: it's kinda like you're asking to be caught.
translation.zh: 你好像巴不得被人发现

translation.en: Maybe I am.
translation.zh: 或许我就是这么想的

translation.en: Maybe I want to make my husband jealous.
translation.zh: 或许我就是希望我丈夫吃醋

translation.en: Maybe I want him to know...
translation.zh: 或许我就是想让他知道…

translation.en: that someone else desires me.
translation.zh: 有别的男人想要我

translation.en: And that I'm still alive...
translation.zh: 而且我还活着…

translation.en: with so much more to give.
translation.zh: 不至于一无是处

translation.en: You're married.
translation.zh: 你结婚了

translation.en: Yeah, I am.
translation.zh: 对 没错

translation.en: Do you feel guilty?
translation.zh: 你觉得内疚吗？

translation.en: I gotta provide.
translation.zh: 我要赚钱养家

translation.en: Then provide.
translation.zh: 那就赚吧

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Listen...
translation.zh: 听着…

translation.en: How exactly do we, uh, get started?
translation.zh: 我们要怎么开始？

translation.en: Well, first you take your shoes off.
translation.zh: 首先 你得把鞋子脱了

translation.en: Oh, yeah. Got it.
translation.zh: 噢 对 明白

translation.en: My...
translation.zh: 老天…

translation.en: aren't I a lucky gal?
translation.zh: 我真是太幸运了

translation.en: Listen, before we--
translation.zh: 听着 在我们开始前…

translation.en: Can I ask you a question?
translation.zh: 我能问你个问题吗？

translation.en: Just 'cause you've been through it.
translation.zh: 毕竟你是过来人

translation.en: You think I got what it takes?
translation.zh: 你觉得我符合条件吗？

translation.en: I mean, to make it in this town?
translation.zh: 在这座城市成功的条件？

translation.en: Who can say?
translation.zh: 这谁能说得准？

translation.en: But what I do know, Jack,
translation.zh: 但我可以肯定的是 杰克

translation.en: is you have a strong light inside you.
translation.zh: 你内心有一束巨大的光芒

translation.en: Shine that light on me.
translation.zh: 照亮我吧

translation.en: Make me feel like I matter.
translation.zh: 让我觉得自己很重要

translation.en: Even if it's a lie.
translation.zh: 即便这是个假象

translation.en: -Okay. -[chuckles]
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: Sammy, nice work. Ricky Boy, that's for you.
translation.zh: 萨米 干得漂亮 里奇小子 这是你的

translation.en: Bad Man Bruce, -Rough Ronny. -[Ronny] Thank you.
translation.zh: 坏男人布鲁斯 硬汉罗尼

translation.en: Hey, there, champ! I heard it went great!
translation.zh: 嘿 孩子！我听说一切顺利！

translation.en: And here's this for your trouble.
translation.zh: 这是你的辛苦费

translation.en: Not too bad, right?
translation.zh: 还不错吧？

translation.en: Avis is a real pistol, ain't she? Ten-year regular of yours truly.
translation.zh: 艾维斯很棒吧？能做你十年的回头客

translation.en: No, it was, uh...
translation.zh: 不 其实…

translation.en: She was kind.
translation.zh: 她人很好

translation.en: It was actually all right.
translation.zh: 其实还好

translation.en: Good. In that case, I got another one for you.
translation.zh: 很好 这样的话 我再给你一个客户

translation.en: Just a quickie in the shed behind the station. Won't take you ten minutes.
translation.zh: 就在加油站后面的房车里打个快炮 不到10分钟就好

translation.en: -Right now? -Right now!
translation.zh: -现在吗？ -就现在！

translation.en: All yours, Kemosabe.
translation.zh: 交给你了 老伙计

translation.en: Well, hello there.
translation.zh: 你好啊

translation.en: Ernie, there's been a mistake.
translation.zh: 厄尼 你一定搞错了

translation.en: [stammers] There's some guy in there.
translation.zh: 那是个男人 一个男人

translation.en: That's not just "some guy."
translation.zh: 他可不是一个普通人

translation.en: That's Cole Porter.
translation.zh: 那是科尔波特

translation.en: He's a living legend.
translation.zh: 他就是个活传奇

translation.en: The Gay Divorcee, Anything Goes...
translation.zh: 《柳暗花明》、《夜夜春宵》…

translation.en: Yesterday I heard you humming "Don't Fence Me In."
translation.zh: 昨天我还听你哼《别把我困住》

translation.en: That's the son of a bitch who wrote it!
translation.zh: 他就是那首歌的作词人！

translation.en: So?
translation.zh: 所以呢？

translation.en: So give the guy two minutes of your time. He's real polite about it.
translation.zh: 所以 在他身上花上两分钟 他在这种事上很礼貌的

translation.en: -Don't keep him waiting! -Are you...
translation.zh: -别让他等着！ -你…

translation.en: Are you telling me you expect me to...
translation.zh: 你的意思是你想让我…

translation.en: Forget it! Forget it, Ernie, I'm not doing that!
translation.zh: 休想！你休想 厄尼 我不干！

translation.en: I'm not-- It's not me. It's not me!
translation.zh: 我不… 我不好这口儿！

translation.en: I gotta draw the line somewhere, all right? I'm not doing it!
translation.zh: 我得说清自己的原则 好吗？ 我不做这种事！

translation.en: -End of story. -Okay.
translation.zh: -免谈 -好吧

translation.en: I see how it goes.
translation.zh: 我明白是怎么回事了

translation.en: You don't get to set the terms of your employment here, Jack, I do!
translation.zh: 杰克 雇员规则不是你定的 是我定的！

translation.en: And I'm running low on guys this month and I got a bad cough I can't shake.
translation.zh: 这个月我本来就缺人手 而且我还感冒了 没办法工作

translation.en: I'm not sitting at some shitty smokey bar to headhunt.
translation.zh: 迫不得已才去那种烂酒吧找人

translation.en: So if you can't walk into a shed and lend a helping hand
translation.zh: 所以 如果你没办法走进房车 向国家瑰宝科尔波特

translation.en: to national treasure Cole Porter, you better find me somebody who can.
translation.zh: 伸出援手 你最好给我找个能做这种事的人

translation.en: Otherwise, no money,
translation.zh: 不然 你一分钱都拿不到

translation.en: and you can get the fuck out of here!
translation.zh: 立刻给我滚蛋走人！

translation.en: That suits me fine.
translation.zh: 好啊

translation.en: I quit.
translation.zh: 我不干了

translation.en: Yeah, well, good luck then, kid!
translation.zh: 好 那祝你好运 孩子！

translation.en: I wanted to be a movie star too, you know!
translation.zh: 说实话 我之前也想当电影明星的！

translation.en: Sweetheart.
translation.zh: 亲爱的

translation.en: What are you doing here?
translation.zh: 你怎么来了？

translation.en: Doctor's appointment?
translation.zh: 我们约了医生？

translation.en: Jeez, yeah. Um...
translation.zh: 老天 对

translation.en: Tell Rudy I'm taking my break.
translation.zh: 告诉鲁迪我要休息

translation.en: [man] You two own your own home?
translation.zh: 你们有自己的家吗？

translation.en: [Henrietta] No, we're just renting at the moment. Cervix feels just right.
translation.zh: -没有 我们现在租房住 -子宫颈没问题

translation.en: Well, it's probably just as well,
translation.zh: 这或许是好事

translation.en: because you know what they say,
translation.zh: 因为人们总说

translation.en: having a kid is just as expensive as having a mortgage.
translation.zh: 养孩子跟还房款一样贵

translation.en: All right, let's see if we can hear a heartbeat.
translation.zh: 好了 我试试能否听到心跳

translation.en: Now, just relax.
translation.zh: 放松

translation.en: Starting on the nursery yet?
translation.zh: 你们开始找保姆了吗？

translation.en: No, we're in an efficiency so there really isn't room for a separate nursery.
translation.zh: 没有 我们住在一个大开间 所以没有单独的保姆房

translation.en: So you're having a baby and looking for a new apartment?
translation.zh: 所以 你们边等孩子出生 边寻找新公寓？

translation.en: Sheesh, that's no fun.
translation.zh: 老天 这可不好玩

translation.en: Are you finding a heartbeat, or...
translation.zh: 你听到心跳了吗？还是…

translation.en: [doctor] They've also raised the price on formula, so keep that in mind.
translation.zh: 提醒你们一下 奶粉价格也涨了

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 怎么了？

translation.en: Twins.
translation.zh: 是双胞胎

translation.en: -[Henrietta] What? -What?
translation.zh: -什么？ -什么？

translation.en: -Yep. Two heartbeats. -You gotta be kidding me.
translation.zh: -对 我听到了两个心跳 -你一定是在开玩笑

translation.en: -[loud thud] -Jack!
translation.zh: 杰克！

translation.en: -Hiya, Jack. -Flo.
translation.zh: -你好 杰克 -菲洛

translation.en: [chuckles] How's Hollywood treating you? Oh, you know, I'm living the dream.
translation.zh: -好莱坞待你如何？ -我正在实现梦想

translation.en: -Mm-hm. -Listen, I got a favor to ask you.
translation.zh: 听着 我想请你帮个忙

translation.en: I'm a little short on cash, but I could really use a costume.
translation.zh: 我现在手头有点紧 但我真的需要一套衣服

translation.en: What kind of costume?
translation.zh: 什么衣服？

translation.en: -One, please. -[man] Um...
translation.zh: 来张票

translation.en: Uh, you don't have to pay, Officer. You can just go right in.
translation.zh: 您不必买票 警官 您直接进去就好

translation.en: Damn right, I don't have to pay.
translation.zh: 我当然不用买票

translation.en: How are you today?
translation.zh: 你今天怎么样？

translation.en: I'm fine, how are you?
translation.zh: 还好 你呢？

translation.en: -I'm well. -Yeah?
translation.zh: -我也还好 -是吗？

translation.en: You got any money, honey?
translation.zh: 你带钱了吗？

translation.en: Sure do.
translation.zh: 当然带了

translation.en: I bet you do.
translation.zh: 我想也是

translation.en: Get out of here.
translation.zh: 出去

translation.en: Shit!
translation.zh: 糟了！

translation.en: You're coming with me.
translation.zh: 你跟我走一趟

translation.en: Shit.
translation.zh: 糟了

translation.en: Walk.
translation.zh: 继续走

translation.en: -Are you going to put me in jail? -Shut up. Keep walking.
translation.zh: -你要把我关进监狱吗？ -闭嘴 往前走

translation.en: -Got a squad car somewhere, or-- -I said can it!
translation.zh: -你的巡逻车在哪里？还是… -我都说了闭嘴！

translation.en: -We're going right around the corner. -Schwab's is around the corner.
translation.zh: -我们去街角那里 -街角是施瓦布零售店

translation.en: What, you don't like Schwab's?
translation.zh: 怎么 你不喜欢施瓦布零售店？

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 你说什么？

translation.en: Could you just do me a favor and clue me in here?
translation.zh: 你能帮帮忙 跟我解释一下吗？

translation.en: Am I getting arrested?
translation.zh: 我是不是被逮捕了？

translation.en: Listen, you're gonna get honest with me real fast
translation.zh: 听着 我问什么你都得说实话

translation.en: or I'm taking you downtown to the lock-up.
translation.zh: 不然我就把你带去市中心的拘留所

translation.en: Hey, Jack, it's ready.
translation.zh: 嘿 杰克 可以了

translation.en: Let's go.
translation.zh: 跟我过去

translation.en: Hey, Jack, what's with the get-up?
translation.zh: 嘿 杰克 你怎么穿成这样？

translation.en: Nothing. It's just my uniform.
translation.zh: 没什么 这是我的制服

translation.en: I wear it when I'm on duty.
translation.zh: 我上班的时候会这么穿

translation.en: I'll have a cup of coffee. My friend here will have a Shirley Temple.
translation.zh: 我要一杯咖啡 给我的朋友来一杯秀兰邓波

translation.en: That's awfully rude, don't you think?
translation.zh: 这么做很没礼貌 你不觉得吗？

translation.en: Explain yourself.
translation.zh: 交代吧

translation.en: -What do you want me to say? -Start from the beginning, why don't you?
translation.zh: -你想让我交代什么？ -干脆从头开始交代吧 如何？

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: I moved to LA after I got out of the service.
translation.zh: 我退役后搬来了洛杉矶

translation.en: I wanted to be a writer.
translation.zh: 我想当一名编剧来着

translation.en: Still do.
translation.zh: 现在也是

translation.en: I wrote a script, you know?
translation.zh: 其实我写过一个剧本

translation.en: Screenplay about Peg Entwistle,
translation.zh: 一个关于佩格恩特威斯特尔的剧本

translation.en: a girl who jumped off the Hollywood sign because the town wouldn't accept her.
translation.zh: 这个女孩因为这里不肯接受她 于是从好莱坞牌子上跳了下去

translation.en: I know the feeling, so I wrote about it.
translation.zh: 我了解她的感受 所以我写了这个剧本

translation.en: Sold my script, too.
translation.zh: 而且还成功卖掉了

translation.en: But a hundred bucks...
ain't much,
translation.zh: 不算多

translation.en: and a studio ain't gonna put a black man under contract.
translation.zh: 而且电影公司也不会雇佣黑人

translation.en: I got...
translation.zh: 可我…

translation.en: Can I smoke?
translation.zh: 我能抽根烟吗？

translation.en: Yeah, go ahead.
translation.zh: 可以 抽吧

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: You need money?
translation.zh: 你缺钱？

translation.en: I get a dollar a script
translation.zh: 我在林肯剧院

translation.en: down at the Lincoln Theater, writing vaudeville sketches.
translation.zh: 给他们写歌舞杂耍剧本 一个本子能卖一美元

translation.en: But that's once a week,
translation.zh: 但一周只能去一次

translation.en: so the way I see it, gotta turn these tricks.
translation.zh: 所以 在我看来 我不得不出来卖肉

translation.en: And I can't go cruise Pershing Square or the farmer's market, okay?
translation.zh: 我又不能在潘兴广场 或农夫集市上走来走去 好吗？

translation.en: Cops will arrest me just for loitering, so I turn my tricks up at Joe's place.
translation.zh: 警察会因游荡罪把我逮捕 所以我只好在乔的地盘卖

translation.en: Beats washing dishes,
translation.zh: 这比刷盘子好多了

translation.en: and I like doing it.
translation.zh: 而且我也喜欢

translation.en: Why not get paid for something that feels good that you was gonna do anyways?
translation.zh: 反正都是卖 干吗不选择让自己开心的那种？

translation.en: I'm discerning.
translation.zh: 我识人很有一套

translation.en: -My tricks gotta be good-looking, clean-- -So, you're a gigolo.
translation.zh: -我只跟长相英俊 干净的… -这么说 你是个牛郎

translation.en: I'm a writer.
translation.zh: 我是个编剧

translation.en: Call it whatever you want.
translation.zh: 随你怎么说

translation.en: I ain't ashamed.
translation.zh: 我一点都不觉得羞耻

translation.en: I know who I am.
translation.zh: 我知道自己是什么人

translation.en: Now, Miss Shirley here is delicious.
translation.zh: 这里的秀兰小姐酒真好喝

translation.en: What if I told you I could offer you an opportunity?
translation.zh: 如果我说我能给你一个机会呢？

translation.en: A job, doing what you're doing, but safer.
translation.zh: 一份工作 做你现在做的这种事 但安全得多

translation.en: What the hell kind of cop are you?
translation.zh: 你算哪门子的警察？

translation.en: I know a fella who owns a gas station.
translation.zh: 我认识一个开加油站的人

translation.en: You pump gas, some customers you do a little more, you know what I'm saying.
translation.zh: 你给客人加油 但有些客人有别的要求 你懂的

translation.en: Pay is good, very good.
translation.zh: 报酬不错 相当高

translation.en: More than what you're charging.
translation.zh: 比你的要价高多了

translation.en: And if you wanted to, you could just do guys.
translation.zh: 如果你想 你可以只跟男人做

translation.en: You ain't no real cop.
translation.zh: 你根本不是警察

translation.en: Also, I do wanna ask you. I gotta ask you...
translation.zh: 还有 我想问问你 我得问问你…

translation.en: Pall Malls.
translation.zh: 我叫帕尔莫斯

translation.en: Could you make it with a woman if you had to?
translation.zh: 迫不得已的话 你能跟女人做吗？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 能啊

translation.en: Sure, I can fake it. Ain't that what most fellas do with their wives anyways?
translation.zh: 我当然能装一下 大多数男人 跟自己老婆做的时候不就这样吗？

translation.en: -He's paying for it. -Okay.
translation.zh: -他结账 -好

translation.en: I'm gonna take you to meet my friend Ernie.
translation.zh: 我会带你去见我朋友厄尼

translation.en: First, you're right, I'm not a cop.
translation.zh: 首先 你猜对了 我不是警察

translation.en: I'm an actor.
translation.zh: 我是个演员

translation.en: But, until that moment just then,
translation.zh: 但在你识破之前

translation.en: you thought I was a cop, didn't you?
translation.zh: 你一直以为我是个警察 对吧？

translation.en: What I mean is, you would cast me as a cop...
translation.zh: 我的意思是 你会选我去演警察的角色吧？

translation.en: right?
translation.zh: 对吧？

translation.en: Sweet beans in a basket.
translation.zh: 这小子真不错

translation.en: He'll do the guy stuff?
translation.zh: 他愿意跟男人做吗？

translation.en: Ask him.
translation.zh: 你去问他啊

translation.en: If the price is right.
translation.zh: 如果价钱不错的话

translation.en: -50-50. -[scoffs] I'm worth more than that, 60-40.
translation.zh: -我们五五分 -我可不止值那个数 我们六四分

translation.en: I like this kid. Enterprising.
translation.zh: 我喜欢这孩子 很有进取心

translation.en: Okay, deal.
translation.zh: 好的 成交

translation.en: Ernie West.
translation.zh: 我是厄尼韦斯特

translation.en: -Archie Coleman. -You're gonna do a lot of business, kid.
translation.zh: -我是阿奇科尔曼 -孩子 你生意一定会很好

translation.en: I can tell just by looking at you.
translation.zh: 我一下子就看出来了

translation.en: What's the password again?
translation.zh: 暗语是什么来着？

translation.en: "Dreamland."
translation.zh: “梦乡”

translation.en: [Ernie] He's all yours, go get him.
translation.zh: 他是你的了 去把他拿下

translation.en: I knew you'd be back.
translation.zh: 我就知道你会回来

translation.en: They always come back.
translation.zh: 干过的人总会回来

translation.en: How's it going?
translation.zh: 你好

translation.en: Can I help you?
translation.zh: 需要帮忙吗？

translation.en: Uh, yeah, I want to go to Wonderland.
translation.zh: 对 我想去仙境

translation.en: The street?
translation.zh: 那条路吗？

translation.en: Oh, that's up there on Laurel Canyon.
translation.zh: 就在月桂谷那边

translation.en: [scoffs] You mean Dreamland?
translation.zh: 你想说的是梦乡吧？

translation.en: Yeah. Dreamland.
translation.zh: 对 梦乡

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: What can I do for you?
translation.zh: 那我能为你做点什么？

translation.en: Uh, I don't know. Are there-- are there options here, or...
translation.zh: 我不知道 有选项吗？

translation.en: You're not interested in a black man?
translation.zh: 你对黑人没兴趣？

translation.en: No, I'm just a little nervous.
translation.zh: 不是的 我就是有点紧张

translation.en: What's your name?
translation.zh: 你叫什么名字？

translation.en: Roy. Roy Fitzgerald.
translation.zh: 罗伊 罗伊菲茨杰拉德

translation.en: Archie.
translation.zh: 我是阿奇

translation.en: This your place?
translation.zh: 你住这里吗？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: I'm renting month-to-month.
translation.zh: 我是按月租的

translation.en: I know it ain't much, but it's all I can afford right now.
translation.zh: 我知道这地方不怎么样 但现在我也只能住得起这里了

translation.en: What do you want?
translation.zh: 你想干吗？

translation.en: -What do you mean? -I mean what do you want to do...
translation.zh: -你什么意思？ -你想对我…

translation.en: to me?
translation.zh: 做什么？

translation.en: Or what do you want me to do to you?
translation.zh: 还是你想让我对你做什么？

translation.en: [scoffs] Oh, you're, uh...
translation.zh: 噢 你真是…

translation.en: I like how straightforward you are.
translation.zh: 我喜欢你的坦诚

translation.en: [chuckles] Yeah.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: Well, I just wanna make sure you get your money's worth, Mr. Roy Fitzgerald.
translation.zh: 我只想确保你这钱没白花 罗伊菲茨杰拉德先生

translation.en: Can I ask you something?
translation.zh: 我能问你一件事吗？

translation.en: Where are you from?
translation.zh: 你是哪里人？

translation.en: Illinois. Little town called Winnetka.
translation.zh: 伊利诺伊州 一个叫温内特卡的小镇

translation.en: Fitzgerald's my stepdad, Scherer's my real dad's name.
translation.zh: 我继父姓菲茨杰拉德 我生父姓谢勒

translation.en: I came out here to reconnect with him, but...
translation.zh: 我来这里想跟他重建父子情

translation.en: it didn't really wash.
translation.zh: 但并不顺利

translation.en: What about you? Where are you from?
translation.zh: 你是哪里人？

translation.en: Where am I from?
translation.zh: 我是哪里人？

translation.en: Memphis.
translation.zh: 孟菲斯

translation.en: So, what's a good-looking guy like yourself doing paying for affection?
translation.zh: 你长得这么帅气 怎么还会花钱买春呢？

translation.en: Why not just go to those joints on Main Street?
translation.zh: 怎么不直接去梅恩大街的小餐馆呢？

translation.en: Harold to the 1-2-3... Cookie, you're making me nervous. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 哈罗德123… 小可爱 你都让我紧张了

translation.en: Relax.
translation.zh: 放松

translation.en: I'll take good care of you.
translation.zh: 我会好好照顾你

translation.en: Uh, I went down there once, but...
translation.zh: 我去过那里一次 但…

translation.en: I-- I saw somebody I thought I recognized.
translation.zh: 我在那里好像看到了一个认识的人

translation.en: A casting director.
translation.zh: 一个选角导演

translation.en: So I pretended like I was in the wrong place and-- and walked out.
translation.zh: 所以我就假装自己走错地方 扭头出去了

translation.en: I'm gonna be an actor, see? So...
translation.zh: 我要当演员 你懂吗？所以…

translation.en: I-- I can't have anybody thinking I'm...
translation.zh: 我不能允许让任何人觉得…

translation.en: that way.
translation.zh: 我是那种人

translation.en: [Archie] I'm lucky I'm not trying to be in front of the camera.
translation.zh: 幸亏我不想上镜

translation.en: That just wouldn't work for somebody like me.
translation.zh: 我这种人做不来的

translation.en: -That's why I'm a writer. -A writer? You don't say.
translation.zh: -我是个编剧 -编剧？不是吧

translation.en: Yeah. Well, I got a studio looking at one of my scripts.
translation.zh: 对 有个电影公司正在看我的剧本

translation.en: It could be a first, you know? Major studio, black writer.
translation.zh: 这可能会创造历史 你懂吗？ 大电影公司 黑人编剧

translation.en: I mean, there's only been two or three black screenwriters before,
translation.zh: 我是说 毕竟在我之前 也只有两、三个黑人编剧

translation.en: Oscar Micheaux, Langston Hughes, but those were race pictures, you know?
translation.zh: 奥斯卡米修 朗格斯顿休斯 但那些都是针对少数种族拍的电影

translation.en: Stories about black folk.
translation.zh: 讲述关于黑人的故事

translation.en: It's like you can't even run those pictures in parts of this country.
translation.zh: 那些电影在这个国家的有些地方 是不能放的

translation.en: But, you see, my script’s about a white gal, so...
translation.zh: 但我的剧本是讲一个白人姑娘的故事 所以…

translation.en: Who knows? Maybe you could star in it, Roy.
translation.zh: 谁知道呢？或许你可以当主演 罗伊

translation.en: Could you imagine something like that?
translation.zh: 你能想象到那种事吗？

translation.en: -That would be-- -A dream.
translation.zh: -那简直就是… -梦想

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: In Dreamland.
translation.zh: 在梦乡

translation.en: And if it comes true?
translation.zh: 如果它能成真呢？

translation.en: When it comes...
translation.zh: 等它成真的…

translation.en: true.
translation.zh: 那一刻

translation.en: We'd look back and say the two of us meeting was
translation.zh: 我们回想过去 会说我们的邂逅

translation.en: that Hollywood dream starting to come true.
translation.zh: 就是好莱坞梦想变成现实的开始

translation.en: There you go, Jack.
translation.zh: 给你 杰克

translation.en: Buffalo Billy, Slippery Sammy, Rabid Ronny,
translation.zh: 水牛比利、狡猾萨米、狂躁罗尼…

translation.en: Goody Two-Shoes Glen, and Arch... Welcome to the family.
translation.zh: 假正经格伦 还有阿奇… 欢迎你加入这个大家庭

translation.en: Ernie, what's the matter? You all right? [clears throat] It's nothing. It's nothing.
translation.zh: -厄尼 怎么回事？你还好吧？ -没什么

translation.en: This black walnut blooms this time of year.
translation.zh: 每年黑胡桃树开花时我都这样

translation.en: Let's make it another great week, fellas! -[workers] Yes, sir! -Go get 'em. All right.
translation.zh: 伙计们 我们这周再接再厉！ 搞定客户 好了

translation.en: -What'll it be? -Dreamland.
translation.zh: -您需要什么？ -梦乡

translation.en: -Where to? -Dreamland.
translation.zh: -您去哪？ -梦乡

translation.en: -Where to for you? -Dreamland.
translation.zh: -需要帮忙吗？ -我要去梦乡

translation.en: Hmm, you are really good at that, you know?
translation.zh: 你真厉害

translation.en: So is this what you do, full time?
translation.zh: 所以你干这行是全职吗？

translation.en: No, uh, just to make ends meet.
translation.zh: 不 就是赚个温饱的钱

translation.en: I'm an actor.
translation.zh: 我是个演员

translation.en: Really?
translation.zh: 是吗？

translation.en: I'm in casting.
translation.zh: 我恰好做选角工作

translation.en: [Jack] Excuse me, sorry.
translation.zh: 抱歉 借过一下

translation.en: Pardon me.
translation.zh: 不好意思

translation.en: Jack! I ain't seen you in a while, Bubby! I thought you threw in the towel.
translation.zh: 杰克 我有阵子没见到你了 伙计！ 我还以为你不干了呢

translation.en: -No, still pounding the pavement. -Sure, sure. That's great.
translation.zh: -没有 我还在努力呢 -当然 太好了

translation.en: Me? I've been working every day this week on a Sidney Lanfield picture.
translation.zh: 我呢？这周每天都在 西德尼兰菲尔德的电影里当群演

translation.en: -Lot of frame wipes. Know what that is? -Sure.
translation.zh: -有很多闪过镜头 你懂什么意思吗？ -当然

translation.en: I walk right next to the camera, real close,
translation.zh: 我走到摄像机旁边 离它很近

translation.en: and the director uses that to cut the scene together.
translation.zh: 导演会用那些镜头 把不同的戏剪到一起

translation.en: Practically editing this goddamn thing. Shh, shh, here she comes!
translation.zh: 其实就是剪辑 她来了！

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好了

translation.en: -I need three warm bodies. -[crowd clamoring]
translation.zh: 我需要有人演三具刚死的尸体

translation.en: You, you and... you.
translation.zh: 你、你 还有…你

translation.en: That's it. See the rest of youse tomorrow.
translation.zh: 行了 剩下的人我们明天再见

translation.en: Wanna grab a bite to eat? My treat.
translation.zh: 要不要一起去吃点东西？我请客

translation.en: [Jack] No, I think I'm gonna stick around. What are you talking about?
translation.zh: -不了 我还得等一下 -你在说什么？

translation.en: Jack?
translation.zh: 杰克？

translation.en: Get in here.
translation.zh: 进来

translation.en: What the hell's going on?
translation.zh: 这是怎么回事？

translation.en: Oh, I, uh, I got a walk-on role in a Cecil B. DeMille picture.
translation.zh: 我在塞西尔B德米尔的电影里 拿到了一个角色

translation.en: Might get a line!
translation.zh: 兴许还有台词呢！

translation.en: Hey, something's gonna happen for you one of these days, Lou, I know it!
translation.zh: 嘿 路 你总有一天也能交上好运 我知道的！

translation.en: How are you?
translation.zh: 你还好吗？

translation.en: [exhales] I love this town.
translation.zh: 我爱死这里了

translation.en: Hello, sweetheart.
translation.zh: 你好 亲爱的

translation.en: What are you doing?
translation.zh: 你在做什么？

translation.en: Nothing, just cooking dinner for my wife.
translation.zh: 没什么 就是给自己的妻子做晚饭

translation.en: Hungry?
translation.zh: 你饿吗？

translation.en: No, suspicious.
translation.zh: 不饿 真奇怪

translation.en: What did you do?
translation.zh: 你做什么亏心事了？

translation.en: Uh, nothing, nothing. Just come here. Sit down.
translation.zh: 没做什么 快过来 坐下

translation.en: We're celebrating.
translation.zh: 我们庆祝一下

translation.en: Celebrating what?
translation.zh: 庆祝什么？

translation.en: You quitting your job.
translation.zh: 庆祝你辞职

translation.en: -What? I like working at Schwab's! -I can't have you on your feet all day.
translation.zh: -什么？我喜欢在施瓦布工作！ -我不能让你一天总是站着

translation.en: You're three months along, I don't want you working anymore, all right?
translation.zh: 你已经怀孕三个月了 我不希望你再工作了 好吗？

translation.en: Not another word about it.
translation.zh: 这件事没得商量

translation.en: Let's eat.
translation.zh: 我们吃饭吧

translation.en: Just eat!
translation.zh: 快吃啊！

translation.en: Oh...
translation.zh: 我…

translation.en: my...
translation.zh: 的…

translation.en: -God. -That's $500.
translation.zh: -天 -那是500美元

translation.en: How-- How did you get this?
translation.zh: 这钱哪来的？

translation.en: I've been doing good work at the gas station.
translation.zh: 我在加油站做得很好

translation.en: Rent's already paid, gas and electric too.
translation.zh: 房租已经付了 还有煤气费和电费

translation.en: Now, that ain't for spending, all right?
translation.zh: 这钱不是日常花费用的 知道吗？

translation.en: That's a down-payment... on a house.
translation.zh: 这是我们买房的… 首付

translation.en: Oh, my God. I-- I don't...
translation.zh: 老天 我没…

translation.en: I thought that's what you wanted.
translation.zh: 这不是你想要的吗？

translation.en: [laughing] It is, I just can't believe it!
translation.zh: 没错 我只是不敢相信！

translation.en: Oh, my God!
translation.zh: 老天！

translation.en: Thank you! Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢你！太谢谢你了

translation.en: Anything for you. Anything for my family.
translation.zh: 为了你和我的家庭 我做什么都在所不辞

translation.en: What does that mean, "sexually ambidextrous"?
translation.zh: “双性恋”是什么意思？

translation.en: That means that my man Stan here likes the cat and the kitty.
translation.zh: 也就是说我的朋友斯坦男女通吃

translation.en: Huh, no fooling?
translation.zh: 是吗 你没在开玩笑吧？

translation.en: Well, welcome aboard, Stan.
translation.zh: 欢迎你加入 斯坦

translation.en: -[bell dings] -Thanks.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: All yours, Jack.
translation.zh: 客户就交给你了 杰克

translation.en: -Fill 'er up? -Dreamland.
translation.zh: -要加油吗？ -我们去梦乡

translation.en: -Hello. -How are you?
translation.zh: -你好 -你还好吗？

translation.en: -Better now, thank you. -Glad to hear it.
translation.zh: -现在好多了 谢谢 -那就好

translation.en: Oh, no, uh, I don't touch the money. You pay Ernie and Ernie pays me.
translation.zh: 不行 我不能收钱 你得把钱给厄尼 然后他会给我

translation.en: Well, what about a tip?
translation.zh: 那你不收小费吗？

translation.en: Well, you can give it to me after, if you're satisfied.
translation.zh: 完事后你要是觉得满意 再给我也不迟

translation.en: Well, wouldn't this ensure that I'm satisfied?
translation.zh: 我不能提前给你 确保你会卖力取悦我吗？

translation.en: Okay, thanks.
translation.zh: 好的 谢了

translation.en: -You're under arrest. -What?
translation.zh: -你被逮捕了 -什么？

translation.en: Got him!
translation.zh: 搞定了！

translation.en: Wait a minute, what is it? Whoa, buddy, buddy, what is this?
translation.zh: 等一下 这是怎么回事？ 伙计 你干吗？

translation.en: -Wait a minute, wait! -[officer] Shut up!
translation.zh: -等一下 等等！ -闭嘴

translation.en: You're under arrest for solicitation and lewd conduct
translation.zh: 根据《加利福尼亚州刑事法典》 第647条第二款

translation.en: pursuant to California Penal Code, section 647-B.
translation.zh: 你因引诱他人以及淫秽行为被捕了
